About me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

After my high school years, my dream of joining NASA’s active astronaut team gradually drifted away as I pursued a law degree at the State University of Haiti (UEH). While the title of Lawyer may have seemed appealing, my fascination with the workings of the internet and the validation of my thesis on its legal regulation became the starting point for my professional shift into the digital domain. However, it was my selection for the D-clic program (Digital Training) by the International Organization of La Francophonie (OIF), deployed in over 50 countries, that triggered this change. Since obtaining my certification in web development with HTML5 and CSS3 from the French online school OpenClassrooms through this program, I have embarked on the path of self-taught learning. Currently halfway through becoming a full-stack JavaScript developer via The Odin Project curriculum (TOP) and freeCodeCamp courses, my greatest strength remains my determination to achieve the goals I’ve set for myself and my insatiable desire to learn.

Website manager

wordPress Designer

As the Website Manager at the Office of Citizen Protection (OPC) in Haiti, I played a pivotal role in not only managing but also initiating the creation of the organization's website. Taking on the responsibility of website development from inception, I successfully led the entire process. This encompassed overseeing the technical aspects, from design to day-to-day maintenance. My responsibilities included content management, collaboration with cross-functional teams, and the implementation of security and SEO optimization strategies. My commitment to the operational efficiency of the website significantly contributed to enhancing OPC's online presence, aligning with its mission to safeguard citizen rights and interests in Haiti.

Freelancer

Front-end Developer

I've been exploring web development for two years, specializing in front-end development. While I'm still waiting for my first Upwork job, I'm enthusiastic about creating smooth user experiences and personalized WordPress sites. Don't hesitate to take a look at my projects.
